column4: Hi, just have a quick question if no one minds :) I dual boot Ubuntu 10.4 with Windows XP and from all the updates my grub menu has got quite long now lol
is there an easy way to clean up my grub menu and remove old kernels I no longer need to save space and shorten the grub list ?
in synaptic search box type linux-image and remove these with lower number it is good to have 2 kernels just in case
if you removed kernels it must be change in grub command is sudo update-grub
